posts.post_title: Red Cobb PSA 1 FS or Trade
posts.post_content:

Looking for the following:

Hal Chase Pink off back
Chief Bender Port off back
Sam crawford off back

Mathewson Port
Any Cubs Off backs (the rarer the better)

Any Hindu HOF
Open to other players as well, but this starts the list. Email me or pm if interested. 

Thanks, 

Brett
